original_text: Now when all the princes, and all the people, which had entered into the covenant, heard that every one should let his manservant, and every one his maidservant, go free, that none should serve themselves of them any more, then they obeyed, and let them go.
korean_text: 이 계약에 가담한 고관들과 모든 백성이 각기 노비를 자유롭게 하고 다시는 종을 삼지 말라 함을 듣고 순복하여 놓았더니

sentences.original_text: heard that every one should let his manservant,
sentences.korean_translation: 각자 자기 남종을 해방시켜야 한다고 들었을 때

sentences.original_text: and every one his maidservant, go free,
sentences.korean_translation: 각자 자기 여종을 자유롭게 놓아주어야 한다고

sentences.original_text: that none should serve themselves of them any more,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들을 더 이상 부리지 않아야 한다고 들었을 때
